name: Treasury Of The Cannon
description:
As the founding nation of *'The Cannon'*, you must protect your economic basis (of tons of stolen gold) from invaders!

Whew! That was a workout! This time I took the compo to learn how to make a full Godot project. There’s a lot of carry-over from how I structured projects in Unity, but it worked out really well! Also, forgot to add ‘Protect the gold!’ at the beginning of the game. Whoops! Might have to update that later.

Hope you all have fun with my game. Have a wonderful day, and I can’t wait to see what you all made :)
